revised_title: Investigating the Effect of Refracting Medium on Astronomical Aberration of Light
tldr: The author conducts an experiment to examine the effect of a refracting medium on the amount of astronomical aberration of light. Using a vertical telescope filled with water, the author observes the meridional zenith distance of y Draconis and finds that the hypothesis of Professor Klinkerfues is not supported, as the true aberration is the same as the received aberration.
